channel.title: Thief Stall
channel.description: I was wondering how to make a case, of a thief stall, and make it give you all gems, but randomly. I know it'd look something like this: [code]case 4462: // i loot i TheifStall2("table", "You steal 10K...", 1, 55*playerLevel[17], Item.randomarmour(), 10000, 53, 0x340); break;[/code]but I want it to give you random gems, also I would like it to be a gem stall. I understand the basics of it, but I don't understand the randomizing the gems part, if someone could show me how, I'd appreciate it!
